author: R Sivaraman
text:
Chief Electoral Officer V. Candavelou said on Monday that all the proposed transfers of government officers would be effected by the end of this month in view of Assembly polls.

Dr. Candavelou pointed out that following instructions of ECI, he had also sent circular to Home Department and other departments stating that no officer connected directly with elections should be allowed to continue in the present district of posting if she or he is posted in home district. The circular also stated that an officer, who has completed three years in that district during last four years or completing 3 years on or before June 30, should be transferred

He said, “The process is under way to identify such officers who come under those categories. All those transfers will be effected before the month end.”

The Chief Electoral Officer said the five-year term of present Legislative Assembly of Puducherry is due to expire on June 2, 2016 and Election Commission of India would announce the schedule of polls after taking consideration of all factors.
title: Officers to be transferred before month-end
